relations.target: unprepared: without preparation; not prepared for; 'unprepared remarks'; 'the shock was unprepared'; 'our treaty makers approached their immensely difficult problems unprepared'- R.E.Danielson <i10140>

lack: the state of needing something that is absent or unavailable; 'there is a serious lack of insight into the problem'; 'water is the critical deficiency in desert regions'; 'for want of a nail the shoe was lost' <i112941>
